item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:257 Chances: CNH’s partnership with the Catholic University of Cordoba demonstrates a commitment to educatiing the next generation of farmers in Argentina. The company’s farming innovations have been recognized with six 2024 AE50 awards from the ASABE, indicating a strong focus on innovation and customer-inspired solutions.
